description: Student Loan Application Credit Status Data.

validation.validation: Provide either a student reference or their Social Security number.
Pending is not a valid selection for Original Credit Decision Credit Status.
There is no student in Workday with the name and Social Security number combination you provided. Make sure that the information you specified is accurate.
Please enter a Social Security Number that is 9 digits long.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.

Ensure the student’s loan application is linked to a packaged award. There is no loan application ID and the Financial Aid Award Year, Award Sequence Number, and Student SSN you specified doesn’t match any existing loan applications.
